**Reissue of Bid Solicitation: Professional Services for Canada Pension Plan Disability Program Service Delivery Improvements**
================================================θηκαν

**Contract Reference:** cb-7557-74998177
--------------------------------------------

The Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC) is reissuing a bid solicitation for the provision of professional services to identify options for service delivery improvements for the Canada Pension Plan Disability (CPPD) program.

**Background:**
The ESDC seeks to review the CPPD program service delivery in its entirety to identify opportunities for improvement. We are looking for a professional consulting team to assist us in reviewing and redesigning the service delivery approach to support the implementation of our Continuous Improvement agenda and future-state objectives related to CPPD delivery.

**Objective:**
The objective of this work is to identify options for improving the CPPD program service delivery in people, processes, and technology, and develop a roadmap to achieve the current Continuous Improvement agenda and future-state objectives related to CPPD delivery.

**Scope of Work:**
The services required include:

* Review and redesign of the CPPD program service delivery approach
* Development of a roadmap to achieve the current Continuous Improvement agenda and future-state objectives related to CPPD delivery
* Implementation of the new service delivery approach

**Timeline:**
The expected contract start date is September 1, 2023, and the expected end date is September 30, 2024.

**Eligibility and Exclusion:**
This tender is open to all qualified suppliers who meet the selection criteria. 

**Terms and Conditions:**
Please refer to the attached solicitation document and associated attachment(s) for further information on the eligibility criteria, terms and conditions of the contract, and any other requirements.

**Contact Information:**
For any questions or concerns, please contact Stephanie Lane at nc-solicitations-gd@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca or (000) 000-0000.
